patterns.task: Find prime numbers in a range
patterns.recommended:
import math
output_val = [i for i in range(input_val['min'], input_val['max'] + 1) if i > 1 and all(i % d for d in range(2, int(math.sqrt(i)) + 1))]

import sympy
x = sympy.Symbol('x')
output_val = sympy.solve(input_val, x)
